Posted By: Tim Newcomb
Prices are somewhat negotiable if you want them both.

Emails take priority over posts.  First person to commit to buying has priority.

Checks/money orders preferred to avoid paypal’s fees, but paypal is negotiable.

S/H (first-class w/ insurance) included in these prices.
